data.title: EL TOPO and the Midnight Movie Craze - PROJECTIONS
data.meta_description: The Midnight Movie craze can be said to have originated with the premiere of Alejandro Jodorowsky's EL TOPO at the Elgin Theater in New York City. That independent, surrealist film was out of circulation for several years, but its mythic
data.text: The Midnight Movie craze can be said to have originated with the premiere of Alejandro Jodorowsky's EL TOPO at the Elgin Theater in New York City. That independent, surrealist film was out of circulation for several years, but its mythic narrative and artistic imagery mark it as a significant contribution to international cinema along the lines of Luis Bunuel and David Lynch.
